coreQueryPageProvider.name: domain_published_documents
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:path STARTSWITH ? AND ecm:mixinType != 'Folderish' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:mixinType != 'SystemDocument' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isProxy = 1
